deep-study.desc: A comparison between shallow study and deep study and their effectives day-to-day.

efficientist.desc: A term assigned to one that seeks to become more efficient in their daily life.

impossible-list.desc: A list of things that I would love to accomplish...and would actually seek doing in the near future.

individual-projects.desc: Provides tips on making individual projects more maintainable.

just-in-time-learning.desc: An overview of the popular learning technique along with its benefits and caveats.

motivation.desc: A broad topic that creates the foundation of everything we do in our lives.

motivation-killers.desc: Experiences with activities we indulge in that can be detrimental to one’s motivation.

multitasking.desc: An overview of the popular idea and why it’s not always the best choice.

school.desc: A mandatory institution whose ideas and philosophies I strongly oppose.

self-control.desc: A factor in our lives that is becoming more prevalent as new distractions and temptations emerge.

self-study.desc: Studying on one’s own is become a more needed skill while being more seldom developed at the same time.

video-games.desc: A popular subject of debate with my opinion and reasons why I believe that they are a waste of time.

the-SSS.desc: A made-up term defining a more focused way of getting something done.

WES19.5.18-thoughts.desc: Aftermath and thoughts on the Weekend SSS done on May 18, 2019.
